name: express-learning
description: In first commit you'll learn - how to setup the node js enviornment in your system - difference between node and browser - no document.anyquery or window object and DOM in node - How to export modules in node using require method - every js file serves as a module by default - some built-in modules like OS (operating System) , path   - OS built in module help us to get info related to our operating system like uptime, memory, release Time etc.   - Path built-in module helps us to get automatic directories of some files cuz in different computers the path of system to the file differs according to different users.

scripts.zainytech: Zainytech here! Just learning some cool stuff about node and npm packages.
